title: Church Complaints, COVID-19 Infections, Little Richard, UFC and more.
itunes:title: Church Complaints, COVID-19 Infections, Little Richard, UFC and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Junior is looking for a very close family member. Obama critiques Trump. The world lost 3 r&b legends. Do the heads of CDC and FDA have coronavirus? A new video of Ahmaud Arbery has surfaced. UFC had the first live event of the COVID -19 period that went down Saturday night. Big Dog's Mentoring Mondays is trending. The Unicorn went head to head with Jilly from Philly on IG Live. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve gives us a friendly reminder tied to his faith and how God has been his anchor in life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
